attributes.action: Give support to 2021 A-level students, and make changes to content and exams.
attributes.additional_details: Year 12 A-level students have missed 5 months of in school learning and have struggled hugely to teach themselves all Of the difficult content ready for there exams in 2021. Some people have suffered mentally because of this especially because of the recent news that no change will be made to our A-level content and our exams. This leaves people with lots of false hope knowing we may have gaps in our knowledge before an exam.
attributes.background: The government need to reconsider there decision to not reduce content or exams for 2021 A-level students because despite having online schooling, this is by no means the same as in school learning with our teachers and resources.
